name: Hokm Plus - Online Card Game
description:
An exciting spin on classic card games!

As a king (or queen!), choose the trump card of the round and try to win the most cards with your teammate. Every player must follow the suit declared by the ruler of the hand! The first team that reaches 7 points wins the match!

Enjoy the seamless online experience with friends or offline matches with an expert or beginner AI, all available at your fingertips.

Compete and observe your progress in the game's leaderboard and collect gems!

Make your profile and choose your avatar and motto. Express yourself by sharing your motto with your teammates and competitors. Send stickers to your opponents in the game!


Enjoy the nice features on this top-tier card game:
- Online matches with 4 players
- Offline matches with perfect AI (easy, medium, hard, and expert)
- Save your offline match's progress to continue playing later
- Customize your profile
- Customize your card skins
- Customize your playing field/board
- Track your rank on the leaderboard
- Claim free daily rewards
- Send stickers and share your feelings in the game.
- Win weekly rewards
